publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-4048 Mr David Davidson: Cairngorms National Park - Ministerial Appointments—That the Parliament believes that ministerial appointments to the Cairngorms National Park should include a fair proportion from the business community operating within the national park boundary. Supported by: Alex Fergusson*

S1M-4048 Mr David Davidson: Cairngorms National Park - Ministerial Appointments—That the Parliament believes that ministerial appointments to the Cairngorms National Park should include a fair proportion from the business community operating within the national park boundary. Supported by: Alex Fergusson
S1M-4048 Cairngorms National Park - Ministerial Appointments (lodged on 20 March 2003) Phil Gallie*
S1M-4048 Cairngorms National Park - Ministerial Appointments (lodged on 20 March 2003) Margaret Jamieson*, Bill Aitken*

S1M-4048 Mr David Davidson: Cairngorms National Park - Ministerial Appointments—That the Parliament believes that ministerial appointments to the Cairngorms National Park should include a fair proportion from the business community operating within the national park boundary. Supported by: Alex Fergusson, Phil Gallie, Margaret Jamieson, Bill Aitken
